DOC.brief_title: Fully Covered SEMS Versus Partially Covered SEMS With Anti-migration System Malignant Distal Biliary Obstruction

It pivotal provide relief obstructive jaundice , improve quality life , allow maintenance chemotherapy . Although SEMSs report superior plastic stent term stent patency , still debatable issue ; uncover SEMS , stent occlusion due epithelial hyperplasia tumor ingrowth metal mesh frequent problem , whereas cover SEMSs prone migration . The aim current study compare duration stent patency partially cover fully cover SEMS primary objective , investigate overall patient survival , stent occlusion rate , incidence adverse event include stent dysfunction secondary objective .
DOC.criteria: 1. > 19years 2.malignant biliary obstruction , 2 cm distal hilum 3.unsuitable curative surgical resection owe metastasis , locally advanced stage , high operation risk , patient 's refusal 1.history biliary surgery except cholecystectomy 2.history SEMS placement 3.coagulopathy ( INR > 1.5 , Platelet < 50000 ) 4.expected survival > 3 month base Karnofsky performance score 5.duodenal stricture
